message: I'm using more buildouts than virtualenvs now, though

@glyph you can try get Shougo to do it, he already got snippets feature builtin ;)
@jmcantrell Pardon my ignorance but is it possible that it relies on virualenvwrapper? I use pure virtualenv and am getting an error about a missing WORKON_HOME.
@hynek. ah, it shouldn't be. let me take a look

@hynek I just added a change that will allow you to set your virtualenv directory. right now, the only supported usage is having your virtualenvs all in one directory (which is the recommended practice anyway).
@jmcantrell thanks I'll have a look at it!
i'm a #vim user and I am here too!
